definition: domain/territory under one's control/foundation of a building/base of operations/crust of earth
-ly/structural particle: used before a verb or adjective, linking it to preceding modifying adverbial adjunct

plate/dish/tray/board/hard drive (computing)/to build/to coil/to check/to examine/to transfer (property)/to make over/classifier for food: dish, helping/to coil/classifier for coils of wire/classifier for games of chess

sentences.english: The bear even made its way to a car dealer's lot.
sentences.chinese: 這隻熊甚至在汽車供銷商的地盤行走。

sentences.english: Who dares, and I compare? Who will win, who belongs to the Ministry of Supervision site.
sentences.chinese: 誰敢和我比？誰贏，監察部的地盤屬於誰。

sentences.english: Commission gave it to me, and you approved.
sentences.chinese: 這塊地盤已經交給我了，你也同意了。

sentences.english: It forms a closed territory which rejects "outsiders to go inside" with the boundary of discipline.
sentences.chinese: 以學科爲界限形成一種拒絕“外人入內”封閉地盤。
你在我的地盤呢，記得嗎？

sentences.english: Lachlan had little turf to call his own but the Post.
sentences.chinese: 老大隻有紐約郵報一塊小地盤。

sentences.english: Even the King of the Jungle needs a hand staying alive on his own turf.
sentences.chinese: 甚至林中之王也需要有人在它自己的地盤上幫忙。

sentences.english: The construction is going on in the three metter width to the south of this area, so we can't get into it.
sentences.chinese: 地盤南面三米寬的區域內正在施工，我們不能進入。

sentences.english: Beijing is my turf . I'll show you around, I know it really well.
sentences.chinese: 北京是我的地盤，我帶你轉轉，這兒我太熟了。

sentences.english: If so, will you be able to hold your ground?
sentences.chinese: 如果真是如此，你又有能力把守自己的地盤嗎？

sentences.english: The next day, cheng bite gold etc are counsel how to take over the unique to the site.
sentences.chinese: 隔天，程咬金等人正在商議如何接管瞿讓的地盤。

sentences.english: Yeah, of course. Well, the Brick Lane Market, it's just kind of like Jewish quarter,
sentences.chinese: 當然可以。布里克巷市集，算是猶太人的地盤，

sentences.english: My hair was in ringlets piled at the crown of my head.
sentences.chinese: 頭髮一卷卷地盤在頭頂。

sentences.english: About us, contact us, How the site works sections.
sentences.chinese: 關於我們，聯繫我們，如何地盤工程款。

sentences.english: This is Thomas' territory and woe betide any other cat that enters.
sentences.chinese: 這是托馬斯的地盤，進入這個地盤的其他貓會倒黴。

sentences.english: This is Thomas' territory and woe betide any other cat that enters.
sentences.chinese: 這是托馬斯的地盤，進入這個地盤的其他貓會倒黴。

definition: building (a relatively large, multi-storey one)/CL:幢[zhuang4],座[zuo4]
parking spot/unloading point/garage place/stand for taxi
(used in the names of grand buildings such as 百老匯大廈|百老汇大厦 Broadway Mansions (in Shanghai) or 帝國大廈|帝国大厦 Empire State Building etc)
unit (of measure)/unit (group of people as a whole)/work unit (place of employment, esp. in the PRC prior to economic reform)/CL:個|个[ge4]
to set up/to arrange/to establish/to found/to display
